attributes.title: Piracy NOT DESTROYING Movies & Games
attributes.caption: Jan 3, 2017
attributes.description: Piracy is up... but so are profits. Both movies and games had a record-breaking year in 2016. So it looks like pirates aren't destroying everything after all.
attributes.display_title: Piracy NOT DESTROYING Movies & Games

attributes.title: What is Star Wars Doing About Princess Leia?
attributes.caption: Jan 5, 2017
attributes.description: Carrie Fisher, who made the character Princess (and General) Leia iconic, will be missed by fans the world over. Her character was due to play a significant role in the new Star Wars movie trilogy... so what are Disney and Lucasfilm going to do about it?
attributes.display_title: What is Star Wars Doing About Princess Leia?

attributes.title: Pixar Shared Universe Theory CONFIRMED?
attributes.caption: Jan 19, 2017
attributes.description: In the before time, the long long ago of... 2013, a fan theorized that all Pixar movies take place in the same shared universe and hint at a larger meta story. Now, new materials from Pixar are happy to show off the crossovers. Is this confirmation of the theory?
attributes.display_title: Pixar Shared Universe Theory CONFIRMED?

attributes.title: Suicide Squad's director said the movie needed ... more Joker??
attributes.display_title: Suicide Squad's director said the movie needed ... more Joker??

attributes.title: Critics WRONG About Marvel's Iron Fist?
attributes.caption: Mar 21, 2017
attributes.description: Marvel's Iron Fist has been no stranger to controversy since it was announced. First with fans up in arms over accusations of whitewashing, then with critics universally panning the series for being unwatchable... now that the show is out, fans strongly disagree with the critical response, with one of the widest gaps in critic/audience scores we've seen yet.
attributes.display_title: Critics WRONG About Marvel's Iron Fist?

attributes.title: Rotten Tomatoes RUINING Movies?
attributes.caption: Mar 25, 2017
attributes.description: According to Hollywood bigwigs it's not all the sequels and requels and reboots that are ruining movie. Oh no. It's reviewers and sites like Rotten Tomatoes that share all those reviews.
attributes.display_title: Rotten Tomatoes RUINING Movies?

attributes.title: Sony PULLING Spider-Man from Marvel ALREADY?
attributes.caption: Mar 29, 2017
attributes.description: Spider-man is making a comeback in a big way now that Sony has agreed to collaborate with Marvel on the web-slinger's new film and sequel. But now that Marvel's fixing Spidey's image up, Sony kinda wants to take the character back and do their own thing again.
attributes.display_title: Sony PULLING Spider-Man from Marvel ALREADY?

attributes.title: Call of Duty CINEMATIC UNIVERSE! What
attributes.caption: Apr 5, 2017
attributes.description: Marvel's doing it. Spider-man's doing it. DC's doing it. Everyone's doing the cinematic universe thing! Including the new guy: ...Call of Duty. Ok, why? Who thought this was a good idea? Well, as it turns out...
attributes.display_title: Call of Duty CINEMATIC UNIVERSE! What

attributes.title: Diversity KILLING MARVEL? Not so fast
attributes.caption: Apr 6, 2017
attributes.description: Headlines are flying around everywhere claiming that Marvel blames its recent forays into diverse characters for plummeting comic book sales. Here's the thing... was it said? Yes. But the context changes a lot about what it means.
attributes.display_title: Diversity KILLING MARVEL? Not so fast

attributes.title: MARVEL: A Guide to Who Owns What (and why)
attributes.caption: Apr 8, 2017
attributes.description: Marvel is a huge success now and practically prints money at the box office, but for anyone who gets confused about why certain heroes never appear together, here's a guide to which licenses Marvel sold away to save their company, and who owns what now.
attributes.display_title: MARVEL: A Guide to Who Owns What (and why)

attributes.title: SIX Batman Movies in ONE YEAR? DC, What Are You Doing?!
attributes.caption: Apr 10, 2017
attributes.description: New leaks claim that we could be seeing as many as six movies in 2019 to celebrate 8 years of Batman. Gotham City Sirens? Nightwing? Animated movies? The Batman? WHY NOT ALL THESE THINGS? Apparently. Plus, there are some other rumors running around, like that Wonder Woman is expected to perform below DC's other superhero flicks, directors continue the DC movie carousel, and Suicide Squad 2 might get a new leading lady to replace Harley Quinn.
attributes.display_title: SIX Batman Movies in ONE YEAR? DC, What Are You Doing?!

attributes.title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi THEORIES and Trailer Breakdown!
attributes.caption: Apr 14, 2017
attributes.description: Star Wars: The Last Jedi finally has a teaser trailer so we can get a glimpse at the movie and start overthinking absolutely everything well in advance. Let's break down what we're shown and see how it might all fit together.
attributes.display_title: Star Wars: The Last Jedi THEORIES and Trailer Breakdown!

attributes.title: GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY: A Brief History
attributes.caption: Apr 22, 2017
attributes.description: Guardians of the Galaxy vol 2 hits theaters in just a few weeks. But the team's history actually goes all the way back to the 1960s. Want to know where they came from without diving into decades of comics? We've got you covered.
attributes.display_title: GUARDIANS OF THE GALAXY: A Brief History

attributes.title: Guardians of the Galaxy vol. 2: IS IT GOOD?
attributes.caption: Apr 24, 2017
attributes.description: Guardians of the Galaxy vol. 2 hits theaters next week, but reviews are already flooding in with opinions on whether this movie lives up to the promise of the first. LET'S JUDGE--IS IT GOOD?
attributes.display_title: Guardians of the Galaxy vol. 2: IS IT GOOD?

attributes.title: Hackers Hold Hollywood HOSTAGE
attributes.caption: May 2, 2017
attributes.description: Hacker(s) have got early copies of dozens of TV shows and are threatening to release them if networks don't pay ransom. Netflix is already feeling the heat over 10 leaked episodes of Orange is the New Black... just when you thought it was safe with the writer's strike averted.
attributes.display_title: Hackers Hold Hollywood HOSTAGE

attributes.title: BATMAN: A History in Film
attributes.caption: May 6, 2017
attributes.description: The Caped Crusader has a long history on the screen. Longer than many realize. Let's trace the ups and downs of The Batman in all his iterations through film and live action television.
attributes.display_title: BATMAN: A History in Film

attributes.title: Hacker Holds Pirates for RANSOM
attributes.caption: May 16, 2017
attributes.description: Is this the new pirates vs ninjas? A hacker (or hackers) have taken a major movie hostage: Pirates of the Caribbean. They're going to send a finger--err.... release a few minutes at a time... until Disney pays them. But Disney's not budging.
attributes.display_title: Hacker Holds Pirates for RANSOM

attributes.title: Wonder Woman the best DC movie yet?
attributes.caption: Some first impressions are in from early screenings of the next DCEU film, Wonder Woman. Will the Amazonian's new film be enough to save the DCEU? Although, Batman v Superman got good responses from screenings, too...
attributes.display_title: Wonder Woman the best DC movie yet?

attributes.title: Joss Whedon Replaces Zack Snyder on Justice League
attributes.caption: May 23, 2017
attributes.description: Zack Snyder has announced he's stepping back from work on the Justice League movie due to a death in the family. Avengers (and Batgirl!) director Joss Whedon is taking the helm on the superhero team up film from here.
attributes.display_title: Joss Whedon Replaces Zack Snyder on Justice League

attributes.title: Wonder Woman: Is it Good?
attributes.caption: May 30, 2017
attributes.description: Wonder Woman finally hits theaters this week.  After director drama and releasing on the heels of the critically-panned Suicide Squad, is this the movie to break the DC Extended Universe movie curse? Let's look at the reviews.
attributes.display_title: Wonder Woman: Is it Good?

attributes.title: Wonder Woman BANNED
attributes.caption: May 31, 2017
attributes.description: It's not even out yet, but DC's Wonder Woman has run into a bit of a snag... it's gotten itself banned. Not even because of the movie itself, but because of geopolitics involving lead actress Gal Gadot. We're in the world news business now!
attributes.display_title: Wonder Woman BANNED

attributes.title: Spider-Man Homecoming: IS IT GOOD?
attributes.caption: June 29, 2017
attributes.description: Spidey's first headlining foray into the Marvel Cinematic Universe is nearly here and the reviews are in. Does this one manage to cancel out some of the weaker attempts at bringing the web-slinger to the big screen? IS IT GOOD? Let's find out.
attributes.display_title: Spider-Man Homecoming: IS IT GOOD?

attributes.title: Game of Thrones HACKED & LEAKED
attributes.caption: July 31, 2017
attributes.description: The Internet Is Dark And Full Of Terrors. Especially since hackers got their hands on a bunch of HBO's stuff, but MOST IMPORTANTLY on Game of Thrones. They've already begun releasing spoilers so now's a good time to never look at social media again, or at least until the end of the season.
attributes.display_title: Game of Thrones HACKED & LEAKED

attributes.title: Everyone HATES The Dark Tower
attributes.caption: Aug 3, 2017
attributes.description: Reviews for the long-awaited The Dark Tower movie are here and.....drum roll please! It sucks. Sorry.
attributes.display_title: Everyone HATES The Dark Tower

attributes.title: Walking Dead Creator AT WAR with AMC
attributes.caption: Aug 15, 2017
attributes.description: No, this isn't Deja Vu. In addition to being under suit by the show's original showrunner, AMC is now being sued by Walking Dead creator Robert Kirkman and the entire producing team currently working on the show over accusations the studio is shortchanging them.
attributes.display_title: Walking Dead Creator AT WAR with AMC

attributes.title: The Joker Gets an ORIGIN STORY Movie! WHY?
attributes.caption: Aug 23, 2017
attributes.description: Everyone loved Suicide Squad. But more importantly, everyone wanted MORE JOKER! RIGHT? Well Warner Bros has heard you loud and clear because they're giving him what every character needs: AN ORIGIN STORY!
attributes.display_title: The Joker Gets an ORIGIN STORY Movie! WHY?

attributes.title: Star Wars LOSES Another Director! TIME TO PANIC?
attributes.caption: Sept 6 2017
attributes.description: Star Wars has just lost another director for an upcoming film. Time to worry? Instability with directors hasn't worked out too well for DCEU so far, but don't panic just yet.
attributes.display_title: Star Wars LOSES Another Director! TIME TO PANIC?

attributes.title: Marvel's TV DISASTERS! Cancelled Already?
attributes.caption: Sept 21, 2017
attributes.description: Marvel's seen success after success at the box office, but TV? Well... the first few Netflix shows were pretty promising and even Agents of SHIELD is doing fine but their most recent series may be cancelled before it even hits TV and The Defenders dropped more than 80% from Iron Fist's numbers. That's... not good.
attributes.display_title: Marvel's TV DISASTERS! Cancelled Already?

attributes.title: DC Extended Universe ABANDONED!?
attributes.caption: Oct 3, 2017
attributes.description: Despite putting up lots of dollars at the box office, DC's had trouble gaining critical support for its Extended Universe movies, so.... back to standalone movies that have nothing to do with each other?
attributes.display_title: DC Extended Universe ABANDONED!?

attributes.title: Rick and Morty's SZECHUAN DISASTER
attributes.caption: Oct 10, 2017
attributes.description: Rick and Morty is a fun show. You know what's not fun? When McDonalds tries to cash in on it by offering limited Szechuan sauce and doesn't make enough and fans start freaking out and berating minimum wage worker. Come on, guys. That job sucks enough already without you jumping on the counters and screaming memes at the top of your lungs.
attributes.display_title: Rick and Morty's SZECHUAN DISASTER

attributes.title: Disney to Buy FOX?! That Would Get X-Men Back!
attributes.caption: Chalk up another one to "The Simpsons Did It!" because reports claim that Disney has been talking to FOX to buy large chunks of the company. While those talks don't appear to be happening right now, it would certainly be one way for Disney to get X-men an
attributes.description: Chalk up another one to "The Simpsons Did It!" because reports claim that Disney has been talking to FOX to buy large chunks of the company. While those talks don't appear to be happening right now, it would certainly be one way for Disney to get X-men and Fantastic Four back...
attributes.display_title: Disney to Buy FOX?! That Would Get X-Men Back!

attributes.title: Justice League Scores DELAYED
attributes.description: Justice League reviews are going to start dropping soon, but you're going to have to wait an extra day to find out its Rotten Tomatoes score. That's because Rotten Tomatoes is delaying the score to turn the reveal into more of an event. Is this the result of studio meddling or Rotten Tomatoes capitalizing on its own popularity? Why not both?
attributes.display_title: Justice League Scores DELAYED

attributes.title: Justice League FAILS!?
attributes.caption: Justice League is out after a long and troubled development. Unfortunately, it doesn't look like the movie overcame the challenges to please audiences.
attributes.description: Justice League is out after a long and troubled development. Unfortunately, it doesn't look like the movie overcame the challenges to please audiences.
attributes.display_title: Justice League FAILS!?

attributes.title: The Disaster Artist and the Art of the Bad Movie with Paul Scheer
attributes.caption: We sat down with comedian and The Disaster Artist actor Paul Scheer to talk about what makes that movie special and whether bad-good movies are really bad or if that means they're actually good.
attributes.description: We sat down with comedian and The Disaster Artist actor Paul Scheer to talk about what makes that movie special and whether bad-good movies are really bad or if that means they're actually good.
attributes.display_title: The Disaster Artist and the Art of the Bad Movie with Paul Scheer

attributes.title: Do You Want to See a Dead Body with Rob Heubel?
attributes.caption: We sit down with Do You Want to See a Dead Body star Rob Heubel to talk about moving to YouTube, where to get dead bodies, and getting gross and naked.
attributes.description: We sit down with Do You Want to See a Dead Body star Rob Heubel to talk about moving to YouTube, where to get dead bodies, and getting gross and naked.
attributes.display_title: Do You Want to See a Dead Body with Rob Heubel?

attributes.title: X-MEN/FANTASTIC FOUR/DEADPOOL Return to MARVEL!?
attributes.caption: Remember those stalled talks for Disney to buy Fox? THEY'RE BACK ON AND MAY BE DONE NEXT WEEK!
attributes.description: Remember those stalled talks for Disney to buy Fox? THEY'RE BACK ON AND MAY BE DONE NEXT WEEK! Not only would Marvel get X-men, Fantastic Four, and Deadpool back... Lucasfilm would get rights to the original Star Wars: A New Hope as well. And that's before we even look at the catalog Disney would be buying.
attributes.display_title: X-MEN/FANTASTIC FOUR/DEADPOOL Return to MARVEL!?

attributes.title: How to Direct Star Wars with Rian Johnson and Ram Bergman
attributes.caption: Join Eric Vespe, Star Wars: The Last Jedi writer/director Rian Johnson, and producer Ram Bergman as they talk about how it all happened and what's next for Rian's standalone trilogy.
attributes.description: Join Eric Vespe, Star Wars: The Last Jedi writer/director Rian Johnson, and producer Ram Bergman as they talk about how it all happened and what's next for Rian's standalone trilogy.
attributes.display_title: How to Direct Star Wars with Rian Johnson and Ram Bergman

attributes.title: Star Wars The Last Jedi Should be NON-CANON?
attributes.caption: Some Star Wars fans are pretty unhappy with the newest Star Wars movie, The Last Jedi. So unhappy they want it removed from canon. Or they want an apology from Rian Johnson. Or they want the movie re-edited...
attributes.description: Some Star Wars fans are pretty unhappy with the newest Star Wars movie, The Last Jedi. So unhappy they want it removed from canon. Or they want an apology from Rian Johnson. Or they want the movie re-edited...
attributes.display_title: Star Wars The Last Jedi Should be NON-CANON?
